item.title: Collaborative Monitoring
item.description: Background Fortunately, we were able to develop a new large project. In this project there are various different teams that use different programming languages and the expertise of different team members varies. We developed the backend that other developers, testers etc. use to call skills. Typically, a hardware client sends voice commands to the backend, which are processed and the requested skill is called (see Fig. 1). Figure 1: Overview of our application.
